result.ga: Ainmníodh go poiblí na daoine a bhí ciontach
result.orig: Ainmníodh go poiblí na daoine a bhí ciontach
result.html: Ainmníodh go poiblí na daoine a bhí ciontachThose guilty were named publicly.
result.ponchtml: Ainmníoḋ go poiblí na daoine a ḃí ciontaċThose guilty were named publicly.

result.eng: Does your father remember those days?
result.ga: An gcuimhin le d'athair na laethanta sin
result.orig: An gcuimhin le d'athair na laethanta sin
result.html: An gcuimhin le d'athair na laethanta sinDoes your father remember those days?
result.ponchtml: An gcuiṁin le d'aṫair na laeṫanta sinDoes your father remember those days?

result.eng: Put those things in order according to size.
result.ga: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.orig: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.html: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.
result.ponchtml: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.

result.html: Duine de na cailíní sinOne of those girls.
result.ponchtml: Duine de na cailíní sinOne of those girls.

result.html: Fan amach ón dream sinStay away from those people.
result.ponchtml: Fan amaċ ón dream sinStay away from those people.

result.eng: I stay out of those discussions if I can.
result.ga: Fanaim as na díospóireachtaí sin más féidir liom
result.orig: Fanaim as na díospóireachtaí sin más féidir liom
result.html: Fanaim as na díospóireachtaí sin más féidir liomI stay out of those discussions if I can.
result.ponchtml: Fanaim as na díospóireaċtaí sin más féidir liomI stay out of those discussions if I can.

result.eng: I hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.orig: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.html: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam naċ mbeiḋ orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.

result.eng: And those are Seán and Tomás - they're twins.
result.ga: Agus sin iad Seán agus Tomás - cúpla iadsan
result.orig: Agus sin iad Seán agus Tomás - cúpla iadsan
result.html: Agus sin iad Seán agus Tomás - cúpla iadsanAnd those are Seán and Tomás - they're twins.
result.ponchtml: Agus sin iad Seán agus Tomás - cúpla iadsanAnd those are Seán and Tomás - they're twins.

result.eng: Those of you who fear God.
result.ga: Sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla Dé
result.orig: Sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla Dé
result.html: Sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla DéThose of you who fear God.
result.ponchtml: Siḃse ar a ḃfuil eagla DéThose of you who fear God.

result.eng: For those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ga: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.orig: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.html: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaighFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ an ṁaise don dream a d'éalaiġFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.

result.eng: You will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ga: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.orig: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.html: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libhYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ siḃ sceaċa a ḃfuil deilgne orṫu Má éiríonn liḃ na sceaċa deilgneaċa a ċur díḃ beiḋ an lá liḃYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.

result.eng: While I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ga: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.orig: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.html: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ponchtml: Agus mé ag breaṫnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo ḃí rud aṁáin ag déanaṁ scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...

result.eng: Those strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ga: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.orig: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.html: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ponchtml: Glanaḋ na ceisteanna aisteaċa seo amaċ as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.

result.eng: Indeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.
result.ga: Go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seacht
result.orig: Go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seacht
result.html: Go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seachtIndeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.
result.ponchtml: Go deiṁin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíoḋ go fóill go háiriṫe na cinn faoi ḟoirgneaṁ a seaċtIndeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.

result.eng: Sometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
result.ga: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugann
result.orig: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugann
result.html: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugannSometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
result.ponchtml: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní ṫugannSometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
